name: Cloud-IDE
description: A secure cloud IDE with real-time multi-user code editing and AI-powered coding suggestions. Built using Docker, Google Cloud Run, and Kubernetes for scalable resource management. WebSocket integration allows seamless collaboration, enabling multiple users to edit and execute code simultaneously.

name: drakon.tech.desktop
description: A flowchart editor that generates prompts for AI apps and source code in Clojure and JavaScript. Uses DRAKON diagrams to create visual representations of algorithms and automatically generates code with AI assistance.

name: vscode-auto-cursor-accept
description: A VS Code extension that automatically accepts and runs Cursor AI suggestions to improve coding efficiency. Perfect for developers who trust Cursor's AI and want to speed up their coding process by eliminating manual acceptance steps.
